member.name: M:AspNetTicketBridge.MachineKeyTicketProtector.ProtectOAuthToken(AspNetTicketBridge.OwinAuthenticationTicket,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Serializes, encrypts and encodes an AuthenticationTicket created by OWIN's OAuth server implementation for the access token.

The machineKey decryptionAlgorithm found in your web.config (Auto == AES)
The machineKey validationAlgorithm found in your web.config
